name: getProfileLogin
description: Returns a login object displaying information about a successful account login from this user.

loginId.description: The ID of the login object to access.

$block: An object representing a previous successful login for a User.

$ul: **id**: The unique ID of this login object.
**ip**: The remote IP address that requested the login.
**restricted**: True if the User that attempted the login was a restricted User, false otherwise.
**status**: Whether the login attempt succeeded or failed.
**username**: The username of the User that attempted the login.
